entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
